cover.body: We provide you with all legal services

about.title: About Us
about.body2: "Amiri Advocates and Legal Consultants" was established in Dubai in 2012 to practice law and legal consultancy in the United Arab Emirates and all its judicial and administrative institutions.
about.body3: "Amiri Advocates and Legal Consultants" works in various legal fields: civil, commercial, banking, real estate, rental, administrative, labor, personal status, and criminal.
about.body4: "Amiri Advocates and Legal Consultants" staff speaks Arabic, English, and Persian.

persons.ahmedDefinition: An Emirati lawyer with a Bachelor's degree in Law, licensed to plead in all country courts at all levels. He began his career in the field of law in 1993, in the Dubai Public Prosecution and the Dubai Courts, until he founded the "Amiri Advocates and Legal Consultants" office in 2012.
persons.description: He has published several legal publications, including the book "Penal Code Stories" and the book "Marriage with the Intent to Kill", in addition to numerous legal articles published in local newspapers.
persons.aliDefinition: An Emirati lawyer with a Bachelor's degree in Law, licensed to plead in all courts of the country at all levels. He began his career in the field of law in 1984, as a director and partner in several law firms, until he founded "Amiri Advocates and Legal Consultants" office in 2012.

services.body:
"Amiri Advocates and Legal Consultants" provides a range of legal
services,
services.body2: including providing legal advice, drafting legal contracts,
services.body3: legal representation for clients, following up on their cases, and fulfilling their rights.

legal.p1: Criminal Cases (Misdemeanors, felonies, traffic accidents, immigration and residence).
legal.p5: Personal Status (divorce, alimony, custody and inheritance).
